public class Draw
extends Object
Return true or false with probability given when constructed. Uses a UniformStream.

Draw(double)
Probability of true is 'p'.

Probability 'p'.
Draw(double, int, long, long)
Probability 'p'.

getBoolean()
Return true with specified probability.

Probability 'p'. Ignore the first 'StreamSelect' values before starting to return values. The seeds to the UniformStream are 'MGSeed' and 'LGSeed'.
